Would you like to use carpooling?

If you opt in to carpooling, your name will be displayed to other riders and drivers and you will be able to select with whom youâ€™d like to share your trips. \n\n If you prefer to stay out, you can still view the riders and drivers around your location.

Your current status is set as \'available to drive\'. You can view other drivers but you cannot vote them in the driver mode. \n\n If you\'d like to carpool as a rider, you can change your status to vote and match with drivers.

You\'ve already selected several possible riders.If you change your status to, \'unavailable to drive\', you won\'t be visible to riders and won\'t be able to match with them until you indicate that you\'re available to drive.Your preferences will be restored when you reinstate your driving availability status.

You\'ve already selected several possible drivers.If you change your status to, \'available to drive\', you won\'t be visible to drivers and won\'t be able to match with them until you indicate that you\'re unavailable to drive.Your preferences will be restored when you reinstate your driving availability status.

You\'ve already selected several possible drivers.If you change your status to, \'unavailable to drive\', you won\'t be visible to drivers and won\'t be able to match with them until you indicate that you\'re available to drive.Your preferences will be restored when you reinstate your driving availability status.
Are you sure you\'d like to end your matching with %1$s?

You're now carpooling with %1$s. 

Don't forget to scan your driver's barcode on each ride.

If you quit carpooling with them, don't forget to let us know by hitting the delete button on their card.
